name: ReXueLinHun Dynasty
description:
A simple action game.

By moving around, enemies are exposed to flaws, constantly defeating them and becoming stronger, enhancing the character's abilities and being able to defeat feudal rulers in the game.

Fighting in the context of ancient feudal dynasties is different from the game of martial arts and immortals, where defeating a ruler can earn more clothing and weapons.

A brand new combat experience, use your favorite weapons and equipment to defeat enemies in the game. You can play many rounds of games, and each round of enemies will become stronger.

Limited recovery items can make battles tense, overcoming pressure and defeating enemies is the only way to obtain recovery items.
